description: Be sure to register to Green & White to get your yearbook and exclusive Graduation Photos! This is the first step to treasuring your memories. Here, students pay and fill out their details to secure their place on the pages.

Your Graduation Photos are included in the yearbook package. From toga, business, and creative shots, Green & White is with you every step of the way to make sure you get that picture-perfect portait!
After all is done, students verify their details and portraits onlineâ€”ensuring every name, image, and memory appeared exactly as it should because every graduates' story deserves to be told right.
Hold your memories in the palm of your hand, as you pick up your Graduation Photos on campus and receive your yearbook at home. While your journey in school ends, remember the moments that made you.
